RelatedSentence: A grand jury filed charges against five people in the People 's Liberation Army 's shadowy Unit 61398 for allegedly stealing steel industry secrets to benefit Chinese state - owned companies .
The criminal charges said that the hackers broke into US computers to gain a competitive advantage , hurting companies such as Westinghouse and the US Steel Corp as well as workers .
